summary: The Lobbying Disclosure Act requires paid lobbyists to file reports on their lobbying activity, on whether they previously held certain government positions, and more. We assess their compliance by reviewing a sample of reports, interviewing the lobbyists who filed them, and cross-checking information. As in past years, most lobbyists filed the required reports and were able to provide supporting documentation. But, 35% of reports didn't...
title: 2021 Lobbying Disclosure: Observations on Lobbyists' Compliance with Disclosure Requirements
